search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for SalesViewer (salesviewer.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for SalesViewer can be found at: [https://www.salesviewer.com/pricing](https://www.salesviewer.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.error: Exception: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='r.jina.ai', port=443): Read timed out. (read timeout=15)

Transparent. Scalable. Made for you. ====================================== Pay for what you really need. Our plans scale with your business growth. Monthly subscriptions. No hidden costs! Choose plan or select number of detections: ![Image 19](http://www.salesviewer.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Vector-1-1.png) ![Image 20](http://www.salesviewer.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Vector-2-1.png) ![Image 21](http://www.salesviewer.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Vector-3.png) ![Image 22](http://www.salesviewer.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Vector-1-2.png) ![Image 23](http://www.salesviewer.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Vector-2-2.png) ![Image 24](http://www.salesviewer.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Vector-4.png) * Pro All you need * Premium The power pack Topseller * Individual Enterprise level Monthly leads ? 50 Annual billing with 20% discount * ### SalesViewer® Pro 50 Essential features for small teams and businesses. All you need! 79 00€ per month 50 company detections 1 website * * * Company ID Behavior analytics Smart categories Instant notifications Interest spotlight Campaigns & keywords iOS & Android app Export & full data access Drag and drop integrations Unlimited users Individual support No contract. Monthly payment. Cancel at any time. Annual billing. 20% discount. [Free Trial](https://www.salesviewer.com/en/free-trial/) All prices excluding VAT. * ### SalesViewer® Premium 250 All premium features to supercharge your sales. The power pack! 269 00€ per month 250 company detections 5 websites * * * **All Pro features** Video (session recording) Filters & automations Custom reports Scoring Offline campaigns Google Ads integration Standalone integrations API Premium support No contract. Monthly payment. Cancel at any time. Annual billing. 20% discount. [Free Trial](https://www.salesviewer.com/en/free-trial/) All prices excluding VAT. * ### SalesViewer® Individual 750 Extended support and individual services for enterprise customers. 499 00€ per month 750 company detections Unlimited websites * * * **All Pro + Premium features** Event tracking Google Ads premium integration Enterprise support No contract. Monthly payment. Cancel at any time. Annual billing. 20% discount. [Free Trial](https://www.salesviewer.com/en/free-trial/) All prices excluding VAT. ![Image 25](blob:http://localhost/bc931f55cd3adddfd3b921ef6aa0646a) ![Image 26](blob:http://localhost/bc931f55cd3adddfd3b921ef6aa0646a) Individual as you Our pricing: made for your business! -------------------------------------- * ![Image 27](blob:http://localhost/1b9a9c92552bf295d9423fb388673cac) ### Pay what you need Plans that match your individual business needs. Full cost control. No automatic upgrades. * ![Image 28](blob:http://localhost/2bb541aa4063989a44aa95c67bb91691) ### Transparent pricing Public pricing. Easy options. No hidden fees. Transparency at a glance. * ![Image 29](blob:http://localhost/7a809828b16e3907463b6e8896d8830b) ### Monthly subscriptions No contracts. Cancel anytime. Risk-free new business development. * ![Image 30](blob:http://localhost/9f583a3090f653abfd52ba2e9d4e71ed) ### Flexible and scalable Always in control. Downgrade anytime, upgrade anytime. SalesViewer® scales with your business growth. * ![Image 31](blob:http://localhost/5ac9e397ab8438880949770b18bd48ee) ### Annual discounts Happiness pays off. Save 20% by choosing our annual plans. * ![Image 32](blob:http://localhost/5f2fb29aefe88200094b61ca8ad47a2b) ### Outstanding lead generation costs Starting at 51 cents per qualified lead. SalesViewer® is a highly cost-efficient way to grow your business compared to other marketing channels and lead generation costs. ![Image 33: Young female with headset](blob:http://localhost/88d84facfff35485242b65ef471d85db) ![Image 34](blob:http://localhost/bc931f55cd3adddfd3b921ef6aa0646a) don’t be shy to ask Frequently Asked Questions -------------------------- * What is a company detection and how are they counted? One detection is the identification of a company. SalesViewer® will show you all visits of that company, but will only consume one detection (credit) per month for that company. * What happens if I reach my limit? SalesViewer® will automatically pause and notify you, to prevent any hidden costs. It is your choice to decide weather you want to extend your limit or not. * How flexible is my plan? You can always change or pause your plan, because of our short 14 day cancellation period. * What is the difference between the 3 plans? The 3 versions offer different features and amounts of company detections. You can find the perfect fit for you in our 14 day trial. * Which plan is the best fit for us? To find the optimal plan for you, our SalesViewer®-Experts will help you evaluate your trial to find the best fit for you. ![Image 35](blob:http://localhost/bc931f55cd3adddfd3b921ef6aa0646a) * „Top tool: visitor identification, lead intelligence, sales intelligence“ OMR Reviews * SalesViewer® 1. We also share information about your usage of our website with our social media, advertising and analytics partners. Our partners may combine this information with other information that you have provided to them or that they have collected about you using their services. Please read our privacy policy for more details. SalesViewer® is a cookieless/cookie-free technology and a service without the use of cookies that can be rejected at any time . You can revoke or adjust your selection at any time under Settings. pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is based on monthly subscriptions with an option for annual billing at a 20% discount. Plans are scalable based on the number of company detections.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Essential features for small teams and businesses.
All premium features to supercharge your sales.
Extended support and individual services for enterprise customers.
